title: France's political chaos casts long shadow over economic growth
content: "At a time when economic growth in France is slowing markedly, this is bad news. The public deficit will remain high, debt will continue to grow," ING analysts said.
summary: "At a time when economic growth in France is slowing markedly, this is bad news. The public deficit will remain high, debt will continue to grow," ING analysts said.

title: I’ve travelled to 40 countries with my aging parents. It's 'the best investment I've ever made'

title: Australia's third-quarter GDP grows at a slower-than-expected 0.3% amid higher rates and sticky inflation
content: Australia's economy grew at slower than expected in the third quarter, as elevated borrowing costs and sticky inflation continued to weigh down on the slowing economy.
summary: Australia's economy grew at slower than expected in the third quarter, as elevated borrowing costs and sticky inflation continued to weigh down on the slowing economy.

title: South Korean won falls, but is off lows amid political chaos in country
content: South Korea's won on Tuesday cut losses after the country's parliament swiftly passed a resolution to demand the lifting of martial law.

title: As global defense spending surges, South Korean arms makers look like a clear winner
content: A steady increase in global expenditure, combined with growing geopolitical uncertainties has provided South Korean arms makers with larger global markets.

title: Microsoft faces £1 billion lawsuit in UK for allegedly overcharging rival cloud firms' customers

title: OpenAI hires first marketing chief from Coinbase

title: Apple says it uses Amazon's custom AI chips
content: Apple is currently using Amazon Web Services' custom AI chips for services like searching and will evaluate if its latest AI chip can be used to pre-train its AI models like Apple Intelligence.

title: South Korea's inflation climbs in November, but misses expectations
